category: news
title: "Paige, Perspectum combine AI, digital pathology tools in bid to improve clinical trials"
excerpt: "By combining their technologies, Paige and Perspectum are aiming to improve pathology workflows in late-stage clinical trials. Their software platforms will give researchers easier access to automated tissue analysis and also help identify more significant biomarkers in those analyses to guide research."
